reply.question: 1. Does the app declare the collection of data?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the app declares the collection of data.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy states that the app collects personal information from various sources, indicating the declaration of data collection.
reply.reference: Personal Information is collected from our Website, through use of an App Store, through email and/or through online forms you complete, reporting problems and through any of your other activities with Company or on the Website. URL: https://xumbers.com/agreements/privacy.html

reply.question: 2. If the app declares the collection of data, what type of data does it collect?

answer.full_answer: The app collects usage information such as web browser cookies and similar tracking technologies.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy mentions using web browser cookies and similar technologies to collect usage information, which includes the data types listed in the extended_simple_answer.
reply.reference: Company employs web browser cookies and similar usage tracking technologies to collect and aggregate general information about users. The aggregate information we collect via cookies and similar technologies may be combined with aggregate information of other users and analyzed. This information may include some or all of the following items: You may be able to reject cookies or otherwise disable the collection of usage information via the settings in your web browser, but doing so may make some functions of the Website or The Xumbers Software not work as well as they would if you allow cookies and the collection of usage information. This Privacy Policy in no way restricts or limits our collection and use of aggregate usage information, which may be shared with third parties without your consent. URL: https://xumbers.com/agreements/privacy.html

reply.question: 3. Does the app declare the purpose of data collection and use?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the app declares the purpose of data collection and use. The app uses personal information for communication, updates, promotions, and to understand and respond to users' needs.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy clearly states that the app uses personal information for communication purposes, updating users about the app, promotions, and to respond to users' needs, thereby declaring the purpose of data collection and use.
reply.reference: We use your name and e-mail address for the purpose of communication with you regarding the Website and The Xumbers Software, such as for newsletters or for upcoming products, Website and The Xumbers Software updates and promotions. We use the aggregate information we collect to help us understand and respond to our users’ needs. URL: https://xumbers.com/agreements/privacy.html

reply.question: 4. Can the user opt out of data collection or delete data?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the user can request the correction or deletion of personal data by contacting the company via email or mail.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy states that users can request the correction or deletion of their personal information by contacting the company through specific means.
reply.reference: We make good faith efforts to provide you with access to your personal information and either to correct such data at your request if it is inaccurate or delete such data at your request if it is not otherwise required to be retained by law or for legitimate business purposes. If you wish to request the correction or deletion of such data, you may contact us by e-mail by clicking the Contact Us button on the Xumbers.com web page or by mail at Konvisser Custom Software. URL: https://xumbers.com/agreements/privacy.html

reply.question: 6. If the app shares data with third parties, what third parties does the app share data with?

answer.full_answer: The app shares data with App Stores when downloading The Xumbers Software.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy indicates that personal information may be shared with App Stores during the download process, subject to the terms of the agreement with the App Store.
reply.reference: In addition, an App Store may receive your Personal Information in conjunction with the downloading of The Xumbers Software.
